title: Topic 003 Question 027
body: You need to update the IoT Edge runtime by using rolling tags.
Which two actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: On the IoT Edge device, remove the edgeHub and edgeAgent container images.
Modify the systemModules section of the deployment manifest JSON file.
On the IoT Edge device, update the security daemon.
Add an update tag to the IoT Edge device twin.
